name: Scarras glasses
description:
WASD or ARROW keys to move and MOUSE to interact

This game was created for the wonderful Scarra of OfflineTv, I only had 3 days to work on the game to be able to complete it before his birthday so it isn't super well polished. however it still took alot of effort and I made it 100% by myself I programed designed and even made the art all on my own.

Scarra if you are reading this I put a lot of work into this game to be able to complete it in time for your birthday. it would mean the world to me if you would consider playing my game on stream. The game has no audio so no need to worry about DMCA :D 

Leave a comment i'll be reading them all.
